channel.title: docker on Samples of Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Samples of Thoughts

item.title: Reproducible (Data) Science with Docker and R
item.description: In my data team at work, we’ve been using Docker for a while now. At least, the engineers in our team have been using it, we data scientists have been very reluctant to pick it up so far. Why bother with a new tool (that seems complicated) when you don’t see the reason, right? Until I wanted to redo this analysis I had done four months ago and it wasn’t working.
